main subnet IP = 212.100.54.0/24

4 subnets = 2 bits for 4 values
00000000 = 0
01000000 = 64
10000000 = 128
11000000 = 192

subnet IP           IP ranges from - to              mask
212.100.54.0/26     212.100.54.0 - 212.100.54.63     255.255.255.192
212.100.54.64/26    212.100.54.64 - 212.100.54.127   255.255.255.192
212.100.54.128/26   212.100.54.128 - 212.100.54.191  255.255.255.192
212.100.54.192/26   212.100.54.192 - 212.100.54.255  255.255.255.192
